name: 鍾孟雲
objective: Introduce the composition, characteristics and applications of electronic components. Enable students to have the ability to analyze, simulate, design and apply practical circuits. The content covers: 1. Semiconductor physics, 2. Basic active components (diodes, bipolar transistors, field effect transistors), 3. Amplifier circuits, 4. Logic (digital) circuit, 5. Integrated circuit. Continue the class of Electronics I.
